name: Blend-it
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Get ready to start mixing it up with Blend-It, a brilliantly addictive new puzzling phenomenon. Clear the screen by mixing colours together in a frenetic host of single or multiplayer modes. Sound simple? Try keeping pace as the frantic challenges increase in speed and complexity. Easy to learn, but difficult to master, Blend-It is the ultimate pick up and play puzzler!
  • Unique and compelling mix-it-up gameplay
  • 4 single player game modes including Freehand, Quickdraw, Painter and Puzzle
  • Multiplayer versus mode and game sharing support
